11522222121.content:
In Wagnard's laboratory:

Ashram the black night was one of the strongest knights in the world, but still he held little patience for trivial interruptions. When he received a summons from Wagnard, he was uninterested in returning to Marmo to here what the wizard had to say. So instead he sent Pirotess to find out what he wanted. "What is it you want Wagnard?."

"What are you doing here elf? I sent for Ashram."

"If you don't address me properly my knife may 'accidentally' slice your tongue, that could reek havoc on your ability to cast incantations. Lord Ashram sent me to find out what business you have. Whatever you would say to him, you will say to me."

"Very well, if fool wants to waste his time, what concern is it of mine?"

"What are you talking about, certainly you of all people don't consider finding the scepter of domination a waste of time?"

"Not at all, but among the other dragon treasures, I have found an item that makes his methods trivial."

"What could make the sword trivial?"

"This, It is a item of great power that lacks any name. An exact translation of it's power can't be comprehended by ones such as you and Ashram, but simply put It reflects and magnifies the one who holds it."

"Are you saying this orb would make Lord Ashram more powerful?"

"According to the ancient texts, 'whoever holds this will be the strongest of all in power'."

"Then, I am to take this orb to Lord Ashram? Why would you part with such a powerful item?"

"The power of even this orb can't compare with the scepter. According to the ancient texts, the one who holds it has the key to the strength of a dragon, but it does not specify how that is possible. I need a field test to complete my study, and I have the perfect target."

"The free knight Parn, and his troublesome companions."

"I trust you will cooperate?"

"I will bring Lord Ashram the sword of that runt, and the high elf I will crush beneath my feet!"

"Splendid."

Pirotess departed, with the orb contained in a bag given to her by Wagnard. He instructed her not to take it out until she had caught up to her targets.

There were two courses of action she could take...
11522222121.title: The Dark-Elf

choices: Deedlit tries to find Parn and run.
Deedlit heard the spell before, now she tries to find where Pirotess left the or
115222221212.content:
For someone of Pirotess' talent, it did not take long to track down Parn and Deedlit who had become separated from the rest of the group as they went out on a scouting mission. There was probably no help available to the two of them within a days journey on foot. A wicked grin grew over Pirotess' face, it was the perfect opportunity for her.

They were currently at rest by a stream, preparing to head back to the village the rest of their party was at. Pirotess had no intention of ever letting them see their comrades again. Without any further hesitation, she reached in the bag and pulled out the orb. Then she turned around repeated the spell exactly how Wagnard had instructed her. Because of her turn, she didn't notice Deedlit's ears twitch slightly while she spoke the incantation.

Suddenly a feeling enveloped her. One of power. As someone used to dark elven magic, the feeling wasn't entirely new, but just the same she had never experienced something quiet like this before. A shudder ran through her, the feeling intensified and for a moment she was afraid she had gotten the spell wrong and she would be ripped apart. But that subsided, opening her eyes again she gasped in surprise that the ground was moving away from her. No, she was growing bigger!

The wicked grin reappeared on her face. She thought to herself, maybe I really will crush that pathetic high elf beneath my foot.

As she kept growing her head reached halfway up the trees, she turned and started walking towards the knight and his elf, it was time she showed them what real power was. By the time she got the to clearing, she was as tall as the trees around her, somewhere around 30 feet in height.

Parn and Deedlit looked up in shocked at the growing dark elf, but that faded as they picked up their weapons and prepared to fight.

Looking down at the pathetic bugs who thought they could oppose her, Pirotess began to let out an evil laughter, nothing would stop her. She could conquer the entire land with her still growing power. By now she was up to 100 feet in height and still growing.

The battle began, but there was little Parn could do, his sword couldn't penetrate the skin of the dark elf. As she passed 150ft tall, Pirotess simply kicked him away knocking Parn in to the stream. Deedlit was in a fit of rage and channeled the strongest magic she could, releasing it all in one great rush against the giant. But even this couldn't slow Pirotess down as her growth topped off at 200ft.

As strong as a dragon? she thought, I could probably rip one in half!

She looked down, but after her last spell, Deedlit had sense enough to hide herself. She was weakened after channeling that much, and even her best shot accomplished nothing.

It was at that moment Deedlit had a realization. Pirotess had to use some magic item to grow to her current size, otherwise she would have used this spell sooner. And if there was one thing Pirotess probably wouldn't risk right now, it would be that item.

Mustering what strength she had left, Deedlit sneaked her way over to that area, using the tree spirits, she located the orb Pirotess had left behind.

(NOTE: This takes place right after the Shinn/Stellar meeting scene in episode 20, so before they wipe her memory of him. I know, makes no sense they'd enlarge her right away before checking her memories, but I wanted her to remember Shinn. So yeah.)

Stellar, dressed only in a cloth robe, and Neo walked outside the Earth Federation base, towards a lone scientist standing in the middle of the pavement. He had a small needle in his right hand.

"Thanks for coming on such short notice." the scientist said, adjusting his glasses. "She's only got bra and panties on under there? Anything else will rip apart when she grows."

"Yeah, that's all she's got on." Neo said. "Are you sure this is such a good idea? Testing out a new formula like this?"

"If it works, we'll have no need for Gundams." the scientist pointed out. "We'll test it on this formediable soldier, and she can show the Eurasian rebels at the town just what kind of power the Earth Federation possesses."

"Alright." Neo agreed. He turned to Stellar. "Remember what we talked about, Stellar. The nice scientist is going to stick this needle in you, and then you'll get bigger."

"Bigger?" Stellar repeated, a curious look on her face.

"Yes, much bigger." Neo added. "Then you'll walk over to that town over there and destroy it. Do you understand?"

Stellar nodded.

"Okay. Do it doc."

The scientist nodded and injected the needle into Stellar's arm. Neo and the scientist ran for cover as, true to the scientist's word, Stellar began growing, becoming bigger and bigger by the second. She looked around at the world shrinking before her with her usual wide-eyed curiousity as her bare feet (with her right foot still having Shinn's blue makeshift bandage tied around it) spread further and further across the pavement. How big did Stellar get when she stopped growing?
115222222222111.title: Stellar, the living weapon

1152222222221112.content:
Stellar looked down at the world before her- it all looked so tiny compared to her now. Her feet were almost as tall as some of the smaller buildings, her gigantic toes were enough to crush a person. In short, she was enormous.

"Neo!" she shouted, looking down at her now-tiny mentor.

"It's okay, Stellar, go complete your mission!" Neo yelled up at her.

Stellar nodded, making her determained noise, and began stomping out of the base and towards the town.


The first people to spot the incoming giantess screamed and ran, but most ignored their cries. That is, until they saw the gigantic Stellar's bare foot come crashing down onto one of their streets, crushing an entire car beneath it with a loud crunching noise. Stellar giggled when she heard and saw the car meet its end under her foot. It was so much different than when she piloted her Gundam- not only was she even bigger than her Gundam was, giving her an even greater view than she would as a pilot, but she was the one stepping on things and blowing things up, and she could feel everything.

Stellar began to realize what a one-sided battle this would be as she stomped down the streets of the town, her gigantic feet crushing cars and people alike. People threw themselves to the ground, waving their hands up and staring up at the gigantic bare sole in fear, but no matter what they did her giant feet would not be deterred. She had a mission, and it was to cause havoc on this town. And she seemed to find it fairly amusing, giggling every so often as she crushed more of the tiny people, and even some of the tiny buildings.


Meanwhile, inside the Minerva a few members of the crew had gotten wind of the gigantic Stellar's attack on the defenseless town. Who was the first to discover the attack?
1152222222221112.title: Stellar's attack begins

11522222222211121.content:
In the ship's break room, the Minerva's quartet of red coat aces watched in amazement a live video feed. The nearby town was being obliterated by a massive humanoid form. But this was no mobile suit, but a human girl! Specifically one Shinn Asuka recognised.

Shinn clenched his fists as he remembered the masked Alliance officer's promise to protect Stella...a promise that was apparently hollow. Unable to contain himself anymore, Shinn sprinted out of the room. Lunamaria called out his name but he didn't here. Right now his focus was on getting to the Impulse...

The Minerva crew weren't the only one keeping tabs on the amazing scene. From the safety of a land battle ship, Neo watched his young charge bring chaos and destruction. "Amazing, isn't it?", he said to the officer next to him, "I think Lord Djibril will be most happy with the results. At this rate, we won't need the Destroy project". The other officer nodded. "Of course", Neo continued, half jokingly, "We might have to use the budget for that on wardrobe. I dare say her current outfit isn't very modest". He chuckled to himself and resumed watching the action unfold.

Stella's rampage knew no bounds. She obeyed her orders exactly, continuing to bring fury down onto the town. Suddenly however, she sensed something. Spinning around (and crushing some houses at the same time), Stella saw a tiny speck flying towards. As it grew closer she was able to recognise it- the blue and white enemy Gundam...Enemy. That word stood out in her mind. She would crush this Gundam like the ant it was.

A voice suddenly emerged from the Gundam over speaker- "Stella! Stella, can you hear me? It's me, Shinn!!"

Days later, the final boss...which was the creator himself, Kayaba Akihiko, or as players call him,"Heathcliff". But he was defeated by a player in the username called, "Kirito" and everyone was free. I personally never met the guy.


But here, I bring you to right now....ever since SAO shut down from the incident and trouble has spread to other VRMMOs, I couldn't do anything at all but focus on school as it was my 2nd focus besides games. But it wasn't until I saw people at a store window and I checked it out to see what was going on and what I had saw, shocked me. It was SAO.....AGAIN! It said, "Sword Art Online: Reboot" on a poster on a piece of cardboard. I thought this game was over and done with! But apparently when I looked it up, the name and company was bought by another and changed everything! Well...almost everything. But I was talking about the changes from what was horrible in the original SAO. They had it stopped from being the death game to the VRMMO that we all needed! The hype was too great as some of us went for it and some of them kept their word of never playing a VRMMORPG ever again, As I was waiting for the game's release, a knock came in my uncle's apartment door and I peeked through the hole to see two men in a black and white suit and shades. I was frightened by this as in what did I do wrong but I decided to say who are they and they answered that they worked for the new company that is making the reboot of SAO! I opened the door and they told me an offer that I can't refuse....being a Beta Tester! I soon remembered that the first 1,000 beta testers were already trapped in the game before the original SAO's release and I asked them that too and they answered that nothing like that will happen. Not while they are making the game. I trusted them and went for the deal. One guy went downstairs and back and brought in a mechanical looking box with the words "Sword Art Reboot" in a futuristic design in Japanese. Since I taught myself Japanese while studying before I got the first game, it was easy for me. In it was the game and a newly redesigned NerveGear. I told them that are they sure that it won't have me trapped in the game and they told me that ever since the original creator was gone forever, they made every precaution to make sure that they have a lively game for every gamer to enjoy in the VRMMO.

I went for it. I made a Beta account/official in the name of *insert avatar name of choice here* and a password and I took the old NerveGear from my closet to the trash and I inserted the newer one. It looks more a headband but mobile and lighter. I asked what is the properties of the new NerveGear and one of the men said that this new NerveGear has a small battery chip that can store a lot of power, making it long-lasting and it has the same thing as the old one but it was made possible to not to kill anyone while in-game while wearing the NerveGear, when it's game over when you die, you come back to reality and getting all of your senses back and whenever you want, you can get back in the VRMMO and logging out is made possible now. I just hoped he was right. I put in the game, I turned on the NerveGear as I lay on the bed and put it on and closed my eyes. In the process, I doing a sword, now with some newer designs, which I liked and it gives you the options to either have one, two, or three swords max. I created 3 swords, one's a dark knight battle sword, one's a red high-powered ninja sword, and one is big high-tech greatsword. I chose my design of having a sliver necklace, a red t-shirt with a red fire symbol, a black vest, two belts for the first two swords by my waist, a long black hooded jacket cloak, black slim cargo pants, red wrapped gloves and black strapped sneakers for running and a sword carrier for my greatsword that is going to be on my back. I pressed "enter game" and I was off.


My first experience to a new SAO was breathtaking! Instead seeing an Aincrad tower, I see a cool looking, high-tech tournament/1v1/team arena! I found myself in the forest, somewhere below that floating island in the sky, it feels strange to not be on that island the first time you play...yet it felt great! It feels free! I soon began to see a sign saying, "Cybernetic Central: 3 Miles", I didn't know what that is but I followed the sign and as I got there I see a bright a city, filled lights because it was under the arena island which replaced Aincrad, the blue lines on the walls of buildings must mean that it is high-tech, and there were shops and things I couldn't even tell you if you have to see it yourself! Soon a guide came up to me and told me to follow and the next thing I see is more players, maybe more beta testers and they all formed a line. They all looked psyched to play! Soon a screen popped up to show a middle aged man with glasses on and a white suit and a black and red tie and mixed grey and black hair showed up and began to speak with a nice smile, "Beta testers, I am the new owner of Sword Art Online named, Daisuke Hara, and I will congratulate all of you to be the chosen gamers to participate for the beta of SAO. For we feel the sympathy for the people that have died from the previous version and that is why once that nightmare was over, we at my company, at Hara Technologies Corporation bought the game out and made new ideas and also fixed the errors made in development over the last 2 years and we want you to see what we have done for the enjoyment and safety for gamers everywhere in the world. The game will come out in 1 week prior on Monday. I will as well tell you the modes we have:
We have the design customization mode, we have made new items, we made new weapons for our custom skill mode, we have even made special vehicles of your choice to travel and explore lands in the game that you have never saw before in the original, called "HaraV" mode. We made new cities, we made villages, we even made castles and foreign lands where enemies or ally NPCs are found. We have even given you the option to making your own homes anywhere you like! It could be near here in Cybernetic Central or it could even be elsewhere! But, I won't tell you what level areas it would be. But I will tell you this, once the game is launched, in the center if this city, is a mechanical portal where it will open to reveal "Adventure Mode", where you will go on a quest to defeat the final boss and complete the game in YOUR perspective or a group if you have a team. Unlike the original Sword Art Online, everyone's perspective is the same but you can decide that if you pick, solo, team, or full perspective, meaning it's everyone's game. As well you can team or be alone with our Battle Stadium, which has replaced the floating fortress of Aincrad.
This year, NOT a single person will die on my watch. I care for my consumers for our products. The new NerveGear will make sure of that as of the game as well, when you die in-game, you don't die in real life. You can just find a save point in the mode as you find a new area or field and if you die and go back to the real world, just find a button that says "to last save point" and there you go. Now, go and enjoy your new game, Sword Art Online: Reboot!"
115222222222222222222222311.title: Introduction

1152222222222222222222223111.content:
(Errors: "I was making" a sword, "Black fire symbol" for the shirt. Not red. Accidentally made a 2nd "a".)

I played the beta until Thursday as it's final beta day was on Friday and they could do the final adjustments for the 3 day weekend. Before that, I already gave my approval with the guys in black and white, whom were still in my room observing for my safety and they left. Everything before Thursday was a blast! It was a lot of fun! Now I waited until Monday, and the guys that came last week let me keep the game that they brought in as a present and sooner than later, players were everywhere in the game! People were running around, people were having sparring duels, talking to each other looking at the tutorials in Cybernetic Central and as I went to the center of that city, I head on to the "Adventure Mode".


Time passed since it's release and by the time of May, I was at a level 53 for my avatar and from a number weeks, still haven't made it to the final boss yet but I already defeated at least 9 or 10 of them. Quite different from the last version's. I already made a save point and got out of the Adventure Quest and went from solo POV to full POV so I can see everyone else. Soon before I was going to log out, me and everyone else, even in Adventure Mode heard a digital bell and all our menus popped up to show the creator once more.

"Hello New SAO players, it is I, Daisuke Hara, the new owner once again. I will be glad to inform you that all of us at Hara Tech Corp. have formed a partnership with the makers of New ALO, Alfheim Online to form a new free DLC, downloadable content for SAO: Reboot!" hearing that announcement got my full attention, "Right now, in 2 days time, we will activate "SAO Avatar GTavel!" and what is that you may ask? That my dear players is a way to cross through games! It will go like this and it will only be available to those that are playing this game. You have made your avatar for SAO, and with a press of a menu and clicking on the options menu, it will give you the choice to transfer to stay here or travel to ALO and back! You also may ask, "But wait, I don't have an account to there!" No worries, the SAO account you have here is transferable to ALO thus creating two accounts at the same time with no charge! Just only the DLC and you are set! History has now been made with VRMMO game travel! Now you can experience two different kinds of games! As well, on the first day of you appearing to an ALO world, you can choose your race and make your avatar once more and skills. Enjoy your day!" A free DLC is sweet and this must be the best time of my days! We now truly begin where it all began.....ALO.

11522222222222222222222231221212.content:
Added Bio to Suguha/Leafa: Unlike her cousin Kazuto, Suguha is upbeat and outgoing. She is much more social and converses easily with others. Even when Kazuto began to push her away after finding out they were not really siblings, she still treated him with good spirit and tried to get back in his life. She can be very aggressive towards those that annoy her or cross her and can easily lose her temper. This is demonstrated in one case when Recon attempted to kiss her after confessing his love to her and she punched him.

Despite her positive outlook and slightly aggressive behavior, Suguha can be somewhat fragile and delicate due to her young age, especially when her cousin, Kazuto is involved. After seeing Kazuto in a comatose state due to being locked in SAO, she broke down crying for the first time in years. In addition to this, once she found out that Kirito and Kazuto were the same person, she locked herself in her room away from her cousin and went into a slight depression. Most of the time she is quick to rebound from these moments and return to being the same upbeat girl.

12512111.content:
"Oh god, I'd better not step on anybody," Daisy thought out loud.
She was of a titanic height, Peach's castle had only reached just above her waist, and she could see mushroom city in its entirety. As Daisy stood with awe at her new size, the toads and residents of the mushroom kingdom weren't feeling so amazed. Panic struck out quickly in the streets of the city; people mowed each other down to run into the subway stations in hopes that they wouldn't be stepped on or tortured. Daisy bent over the city and tried to calm people down, but she didn't make any steps, in fear of stepping on citizens
She stood motionless in her position, arms crossed, when she noticed a "small" plane flying toward her. Daisy instantly took this as a threat to slash her neck, and held her hands up to crash the plane and catch it. The propeller cut up her hand a bit, but she was fine otherwise. The plane had fallen into her hand right side up only missing a wing, but it wasn't flaming. The pilot of the plane stepped out of the plane and gazed up at the worried look of Daisy.
"Oh my god, are you alright? I had to stop you, but I was afraid if I caught you I'd crush you and you were coming for my thought, and...I, hope I didn't hurt you, are you alright?" Daisy panicked, for she feared she killed an innocent life.
"I'm fine", the pilot said, as he took off his helmet, "I was sent to give you a message from Princess Toadstool"
Daisy was surprised the pilot didn't suffer any serious injuries, but needed to know the message from her cousin. "What did she say? did I hurt anybody when I grew?"
"No," the pilot said reassuringly (but he didn't know for sure), "she said to meet her behind the castle for safety measures, and the area around the castle was cleared of people."
"Oh, thank you. Let me put you down," Daisy reached down and put the pilot on a balcony on the castle, and walked as closely to the castle as possible to get to the back garden. Peach was standing on the to greet her and told Daisy....

Nina Williams


The one who went through super cryosleep, she was chosen again to undergo an experiment. Heihachi warned her that if she did not cooperate, Lei Wulong would be getting some anonymous calls, if you know what I mean.

Knowing she would get the death penalty for her assassinations all around the world, she had no choice but to accept the old man's proposal.

"Heihachi sure knows his blackmail" she commented as she spoke with Lee, who became her friend throughout the many tournaments.

"Thats because hes had a lot of time to work on them. If you think that was bad, you should have saw him work his magic with Microsoft" he joked, trying to lighten the situation. She would normally laugh, but her hitman nature prevented that, so she gave him a smirk.

"Sorry I gotta do this, whatever it is. Knowing pops its probably a teleporter or a gamma injector" he said, working the machines.

"Don't blame yourself. I'd rather get blasted by you than one of the scientists" she said, standing against the wall. Lee prepped the machine and fired a blue growth beam at her. All of her clothes except her shoes would grow with he, but how fast will it happen.
1252122.title: The Experiment

12521221.content:
Before she knew it she was a few hundred feet tall. The whole room was about to collapse on Lee, but she grabbed him and set him down away from the damage. He was very thankful.

"I hope Kuma made it out of there ok" Lee said worriedly. A roar from down below signaled the grizzly was fine. Nina sat down on the hillside, thinking about everything.

"I guess my days as a silent assassin are over." she sighed, looking around. What could she do now?
12521221.title: Assassin days are over

125212211.content:
It had been awhile since she last saw her beloved clone son, Steve. There was a problem though. He lived in Great Britain, and she was in Japan right now. There was no way a giantess could get across the world like that. Groaning, she then turned to Lee and smirked.

"You wouldn't happen to have a cargo ship, now would you?" she asked.

"Yeah, but what are you getting at?" he wondered.

"I want to go to England and see my son. I will pay any price for transportation." she said. She made a lot of money from her work, and Lee knew and loved it.

He provided her with an air carrier ship, and she rode compfortably on it. It took only a few days to reach the London harbor. Where is steve?
125212211.title: Going to England

choices: King jumps in the ring to settle the score with Marduk
1252122111.content:
(note, this is the Marduk Ending of Tekken 5, sorta, so if you havn't played, don't yell at me for giving it away)


It was the fight to end all fights. The wrestler against the boxer. This was Rocky III all over again. Nina carefully tiptoed through the parking lot as to not crush any cars or cause noise. God knows she was pissed when Anna fired a missle at her convertable, so she decided to show some common courtesy. The roof was made of glass so she can see inside.

Just like in Rocky III, the boxer was getting his ass kicked. Marduk was too tall for Steve to land a face shot, and Steve was too sporting to go for a low blow, so he had to make due going for body blows. Slam after slam, then some backhands, and Marduk was about to end this fight. Whats gonna happen?
1252122111.title: Rocky III all over again

12521221111.content:
The next thing everyone saw was a giant fist come through the glass ceiling. Shards rained to the ground, but no one was hurt. The fighters instantly remembered who Nina was, and were just too shocked to continue the bout.

"Now now, not nice to hit a man that has gloves on" she said in a teasing tone.

"Nina...?" Steve asked.

"For now on,I'm to be referred to as mother. I never had the chance to raise you Steve, and now that I'm no longer an assassin, I have more time on my hands" she said. Marduk instantly gulped and stepped back.

"No,I'm not going to kill you, especially when my son can do more damage" she said. Marduk turned to his left only to come across Steve's signature haymaker. The jumping attack hit him so powerful in the face it spun him around and sent him to the canvas. The referee, shocked like everyone else, did the 10 count. The whole stadium erupted with applause, and the battered Steve raised his hands in victory. King, who saw the whole thing, clapped. Vengeance was finally his. Also, Kazuya was watching from the shadows, impressed his clone project worked better than he thought.

"Thats the Williams blood..." Nina whispered to herself.
12521221111.title: True fighter

125212211111.content:
Steve raised his hands in victory, but before he could celebrate he collapsed to the ground like a ragdoll (which from Nina's view probably was). The fans were shocked that their hometown hero took more damage than expected.

"Heh...your fighting days are over Fox!" Marduk said, getting to his feet. He walked over and tried to add insult to injury, but King wasn't about to let that happen. The masked fighter jumped in the ring and held Marduk off while paramedics rushed to Steve's aid.
125212211111.title: Price of victory

choices: Give in. He has Steve hostage
125212211112.content:
Kazuya stepped from the crowed and eased his way through security as he got into the ring. Marduk remembered him from the tournament and got up, attempting to knock him out. The smaller man took note of this, and when Marduk came at him, he sent a kick to the chest that shattered ribs instantly. The massive man fell to the ground, his eyes rolled up.

"Mishima...what do you want?" Steve said, dazed from his fight.

"This has nothing to do with you,clone. I have business with your mother up there" Kazuya said in rough english.

"Me?" asked a shocked giant Nina.

"That idiot Lee forgot to tell you the catch. Perhaps he had feelings for you, maybe not. Your now the Mishima's weapon,and soon this world will fall beneath the Zaibatsu!" he said, not aware hes on live TV. The world now knew of the giantess Nina Williams, but Kazuya was more fearsome.

"And if I refuse?" she snarled, not wanting to be any part of them anymore.

"Then I'll do to your son what my father did to your father..." he said, his eyes emitting purple sparks. The devil still resides in him, and he could kill Steve instantly in his state.

What does Nina do?
125212211112.title: Blackmail

info.brief_description: Anime and videogame characters grow to new heights! New chapters needed!
info.description:
With the disappearence of some other stories, I've put together a brand-new anime and videogame growth story. Any kind of growth- female or male- is allowed, just don't get too much into the toilet stuff and we'll be fine. I'm going to focus at first on anime that I don't see covered in any other of these types of stories, but if you want to try a more traditional one, be my guest. Just please make sure to leave open the Other option at all times.

UPDATE (5/7): Since apparently the word "growth" in the title rather than generic GTS/GT story wasn't enough of a hint to some people, this is strictly a growth-only story. THERE ARE NO SHRINKING ENTRIES ALLOWED, PERIOD. Any shrinking entries will be deleted by me personally as soon as I see them. I don't care if you think I'm a control freak, I hate shrinking and don't want it in my story. If you don't like that, tough, go make your own story and include all the shrinking you want. If you want to write in my story, it's gonna be growth only, and that's all there is to it.

Follow the rules and we'll be fine. Thanks.
